divs: sighting detailsi live near dia airport and was putting some things away and i looked up thru the window and saw five objects that did not appear to be moving so i started to watch them and then i realized planes were coming and going but these were not moving. the objects were blinking red and green and one started to get very bright like a star and then it went back to the red\green color lights but three more objects appeared and i watched the objects for about thirty minutes until they moved towards the east and were gone. i am not shocked to see them but am excited to have witnessed them.
